text:
Hello developers!

We are introducing *Themes* to the HubSpot CMS, a portable and contained collection of developer assets designed to work together to enable a marketer-friendly content editing experience. Themes allow content creators to make global website style changes without having to edit CSS files. To learn more about Themes, and request to be part of the Themes for developers beta, join <#CSFGKSHT7|themes>, and check out the PR which turns the CMS Boilerplate into a theme for details on how to get involved!

<https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-theme-boilerplate/pull/71>
